name: One Technique
description:
Made as part of GMTK Game Jam 2019, with a theme of 'only one'. Try and defeat as many enemies as possible using only one sword technique.

(This ended up being more of a proof of concept than anything else)

CONTROLLER RECOMMENDED
Move with left analog stick, aim your attacks with right analog stick.
Hold down right bumper to charge an attack and release it to unleash the attack.

Each segment of the charge meter indicates a longer distance traveled.
Attacking when the meter is yellow will increase the rate of charge for the next attack.
